channel.title: Heavenrsps - 317 - Original Near reality feeling
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Intro[/size] Year after year, I've been looking for a server like the original near reality whom we all loved so much. But unfortunately without any success. So I figured, why not take the matter into my own hands? I threw a message out to some some friends about the idea and the response i got was insanely motivating. Apparently I am not the only one who has been looking for a server like the good old NR.
[size=18pt]Forums![/size] [url=http://heaven-rsps.com/forum.php]Heaven-rsps[/url]
[size=18pt]Features[/size]
[ul][*]Original Near reality vibe. [*]Max hit calculator. [*]Vps (paid but pending, done within the next 2 days) [*]2 donator islands with great perks. [*]Dicing npc. [*]Rare loot announcer. [*]Custom items (Lime whip, death cape and more) [*]Custom bosses. [*]Completionist cape [*]Clue scrolls. [*]Global boss drops like 10-30m cash stacks and antique lamps. [*]Auto cache downloader. (Within the next 2 days) [*]Pest controll [*]Castle wars [*]Fight pits[/ul]
[center][size=18pt]In-game footage[/size][/center]
[size=18pt]Donator shops[/size] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/29mq4ar.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2dbnxqw.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Donor zones, ::di and ::die[/size] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2zqr3u1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2z6e24x.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Edge home[/size] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/23ht2r9.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Ganodermic beast![/size] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/104nf9v.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Good old Nr-corp![/size] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2nuj4tw.png[/img]
